sentences.sContent: She badgered me for weeks until I finally gave in.
sentences.sCn: 她缠了我好几个星期，直到我最终答应了她。

remMethod.val: 老烦扰 (badger) 别人是不好的 (bad) 行为

trans.tranOther: to try to persuade someone by asking them something several times
an animal that has black and white fur, lives in holes in the ground, and is active at night
